A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing.  The film's visuals are great\, and I do like the fresh takes on Luke\, Rey\, and Kylo.  However\, the film has several poorly written scenes and numerous plot holes that are just too glaring to ignore.  While I like humor in Star Wars\, the choices here were just bizarre -- the jokes just didn't land. \nStar Wars\, by its nature\, is a bit silly\, but this was just too much.  Overall\, it felt like Rian Johnson was thumbing his nose at longtime fans.
